trans-unit.source: A pure Python interface for the Raspberry Pi camera module.
trans-unit.target: Una interfaz de Python puro para el módulo de la cámara Raspberry Pi.

trans-unit.source: Packages can be downloaded from PyPI, but reading the installation instructions is more likely to be useful
trans-unit.target: Packages can be downloaded from PyPI, but reading the installation instructions is more likely to be useful

trans-unit.source: The source code can be obtained from GitHub, which also hosts the bug tracker
trans-unit.target: The source code can be obtained from GitHub, which also hosts the bug tracker

trans-unit.source: The documentation (which includes installation, quick-start examples, and lots of code recipes) can be read on ReadTheDocs
trans-unit.target: The documentation (which includes installation, quick-start examples, and lots of code recipes) can be read on ReadTheDocs

trans-unit.source: The code is licensed under the BSD license
trans-unit.target: The code is licensed under the BSD license

trans-unit.source: This package provides a pure Python interface to the Raspberry Picamera module for Python 2.7 (or above) or Python 3.2 (or above).
trans-unit.target: This package provides a pure Python interface to the Raspberry Picamera module for Python 2.7 (or above) or Python 3.2 (or above).
